text: Jennifer Lawrence has been single since her 2017 split from her Mother! director Darren Aronofsky. But it looks as if the Oscar - winning actress has been getting close to another director lately - her longtime collaborator David O Russell, whom she has made the films Silver Linings Playbook, American Hustle and Joy with. On Thursday the 27 - year - old actress and the 59 - year - old director were seen arm - in - arm as they left a three - hour dinner at Felice Ristorante & Wine Bar in New York City. They even traded off wearing a New York cap, proving how cozy they are.
